name: German Club
description: German Students from MHS meet monthly to share and inspire learning about German Language and Culture.

name: Comets in Action
description: Together, peer buddies and students with disabilities will play games, make crafts, and generally have a good time socially. We meet once per month after school on the third Wednesday of the month.

name: Power of the Pen
description: Power of the Pen is a competitive writing team. If you love creative writing, try out for Power of the Pen in the fall!

name: Spanish Club
description: The Spanish club is a place for all students to explore different Spanish speaking countries' traditions, foods, music, and culture. Each month we focus on a different tradition of a specific country and celebrate it as they do in there. Spanish language experience is not required, all students are welcome!

name: Student Impact
description: This group meets on Wednesday morning for about 10 minutes to fellowship with one another, have a brief discussion about scripture, and pray for each other, our school, and our community.

name: Rubik's Club
description: Rubik's club is a club for anyone interested in connecting and cubing.  We have a very friendly and welcoming group of students who spend time connecting, talking, and sharing strategies for solving a variety of cubes.  We keep track of every participant's different solves and times to see improvement week to week.  If you enjoy meeting new people who also love cubing, this is the place for you.

name: Stock Market Club
description: Stock Market Club is an opportunity for students to learn more about the stock market and investing. Students also participate in groups to compete in the Stock Market Game to see how real life investing strategies work in the real world.

name: Science Olympiad
description:
Attention all MMS students! Are you a 7th or 8th grader interested in learning and competing in various fields of science? Science Olympiad is the perfect team for you! Featuring events ranging from Life Sciences, Earth & Space, Physics and Chemistry, to Technology & Engineering, our club has something for everyone. 
 
Science Olympiad gives members a chance to discover exciting new fields of science, all while making new friends, and having fun/working together with teammates at meetings! Our team attends high-level competitions (Regionals, States, possibly Nationals), and you’ll be sure to make countless memories you’ll never forget.

name: MMS Student Council
description: MMS Student Council is an organization of Mason 7th and 8th grade students who are interested in helping to make our school and our community a better place to live and learn.
